backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor types and state for alumni profiles, events, announcements, gallery images, activities, and snapshots with authorization and approval integration.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries documenting feature IDs, descriptions, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries of various frontend files and components for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing the root div and script to load the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/admin/Activities: Admin panel listing activities with options to create, edit, or delete them.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActivityEd: Dialog for creating, editing, or deleting activities, including photo uploads and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryAdm: Displays gallery images with options to create, edit, and delete items using dialogs and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryEdi: Dialog for creating, editing, or deleting gallery images with validation, file upload, and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/MembersAdm: Admin interface for viewing and managing member approval statuses with filtering and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AdminOnly.tsx: Component that conditionally renders children only for admins, showing an access denied card otherwise.
frontend/src/components/AlumniCard.tsx: Displays a clickable alumni profile card with name, graduation info, department, location, and optional bio.
frontend/src/components/AlumniProfileDet: Modal dialog showing full alumni profile details including location, bio, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/AlumniProfileFor: Form for creating or editing an alumni profile with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementAdmi: Provides a button to open the announcement composer dialog for creating announcements.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementCard: Displays an announcement’s title, formatted date, and content inside a card.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementComp: Dialog for creating announcements with title/content inputs and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer showing copyright, a link, and the build version label.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with navigation, auth controls, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and page content.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button handling login/logout via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/backend/BackendS: Confirmation dialog to delete a backend snapshot using a mutation and formatted timestamp display.
Dialog for creating or editing backend snapshots with form validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/BackendUnavailab: Card indicating backend connection failure with a retry button.
frontend/src/components/BuildVersionLabe: Displays the current build version string.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryFilters: Filter panel for searching alumni by name, year, or department.
Provides a button to open the event editor dialog for creating events.
frontend/src/components/EventCard.tsx: Card showing event title, date, time, location, and optional description.
frontend/src/components/EventEditorDialo: Dialog component that creates, edits, or deletes events using form inputs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/PhotoLightboxDia: Lightbox dialog for browsing photos with keyboard and button navigation.
Gatekeeper component that checks auth, backend readiness, and approval status before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Wrapper that shows a login prompt if the user is not authenticated, otherwise renders children.
frontend/src/config/buildInfo.ts: Exports the build version string from environment variables with a fallback.
frontend/src/config/superAdmins.ts: Defines and exposes a super-admin principal allowlist and helper functions to check or retrieve it.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccess.ts: Aggregates user authentication, admin status, approval state, and backend readiness into a unified access object.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when changed.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendSnapshots.t: React Query hooks for listing, creating, updating, and deleting backend snapshots via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendSnapshotTab: Hook managing backend snapshot table state with search, filtering, sorting, and pagination.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendStatus.ts: Tracks backend actor readiness with timeout handling and provides retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendSummary.ts: Fetches backend status summary once identity and actor are ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns current authenticated user's identity, principal info, and profile loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Determines if the current user is admin or super-admin using backend check and config.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, events, announcements, gallery images, activities, and related lists.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Displays a list of activities with photos, handles loading and errors, and provides a photo lightbox viewer.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard with tabbed panels for managing members, content, and events, including access checks and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Shows announcements fetched from the backend with loading, empty state, and backend availability handling.
frontend/src/pages/BackendPage.tsx: Admin-only interface for managing backend snapshots with search, sorting, pagination, and snapshot editing/deletion dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Alumni directory with filters, search, profile listing, backend status handling, and profile detail dialog.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays upcoming and past events in tabbed views with backend status checks, loading states, and retry logic.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery of images with loading/error states and a lightbox viewer, using fetched gallery data.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with feature highlights, hero section, and navigation actions based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Loads and edits the authenticated user’s alumni profile with backend status checks, form handling, and save operations.
frontend/src/utils/imageDataUrl.ts: Provides image file validation and utilities for converting uploaded images to Data URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the app’s state, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for building a role‑based alumni association app. Contains guidance for RBAC, member approval, content management, diagnostics, and admin tooling.
